name: Sentinel-3 Ocean Land Colour Instrument (OLCI)
shortDescription: This example uses the optical bands of Sentinel-3 OLCI to detect Sargassum seaweed following Hu's Floating Algae Index (FAI)
description:
Overview
This example uses the optical bands of Sentinel-3 OLCI to detect Sargassum seaweed following Hu's Floating Algae Index (FAI).

Outcome
You are able to visualise/understand the way in which the multiple bands from OLCI are used to answer a specific scientific question, in this case floating algae detection.

  1. Load a chlorophyl layer
  2. Create a point on the map and create a spectral overview plot
  3. Create an enhanced colour (Red-Green-Blue) Rayleigh corrected OLCI RGB image by selecting the following channels Oa10, Oa06 and Oa04
  4. Look again at the spectral overview plot and take a closer look at the peaks near infrared
  5. Look again at the spectral overview plot and take a closer look at the peaks near infrared
  6. Create an RGB layer to highlight FAI by selecting the following channels Oa08, Oa10 and Oa21
